response.overview: Come along as Playboy takes you backstage on our most revealing, most daring tour of gentlemen's clubs ever. These stunning, talented dancers didn't have to get arrested to qualify for Playboy's Strip Search, they just had to knock our socks off - and they did. We've picked the most provocative scenes from our nights on the town and assembled a reel of the hottest peels from America's sexiest after-hours hot spots. In San Diego, Minneapolis, Phoenix, Portland and Boston, we found the most incredible bodies on the planet. And there's more: we brought your favorite adult stars along on our cross-country tour.
response.tagline: Just when you think you can't take any more, these girls take you further. This is one strip show you can't afford to miss.
response.title: Playboy: Strip Search Backstage
